getIdentifier() == 'home' && Mage::app()->getFrontController()->getRequest()->getRouteName() == 'cms')) : ?> getOgImage(); if($ogImage): $mediaOgImage = Mage::getBaseUrl(Mage_Core_Model_Store::URL_TYPE_MEDIA).$ogImage; ?> getFrontController()->getRequest()->getRouteName() == 'cms'): ?> getOgUrl(); ?> getOgTitle(); ?> getOgType(); ?> getOgDescription(); ?> getOgImage(); if($ogImage): $mediaOgImage = Mage::getBaseUrl(Mage_Core_Model_Store::URL_TYPE_MEDIA).$ogImage; ?> getRequest()->getActionName(); $modulename = $this->getRequest()->getModuleName(); ?> getCssJsHtml() ?> getChildHtml() ?> helper('core/js')->getTranslatorScript() ?> getIncludes() ?> getSkinUrl('css/demo.css'); ?>" />*/ ?>
